title: You've got to start somewhere
creator_credit: Maureen McCarthy, Chris Warner and Trout Films
brief_description: Focuses on a multicultural project at Ferntree Gully Primary School to show what teachers at schools with low migrant populations can do to put the philosophy of education in a multicultural society into practice.
creator_credit_for_label: Maureen McCarthy, Chris Warner and Trout Films
